name: CUSTOM Video banner pro
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign layout_height = section.settings.layout_height
  assign layout_fixed_height = section.settings.layout_fixed_height
  assign layout_fixed_height_mobile = section.settings.layout_fixed_height_mobile
  assign liquid_glass = section.settings.liquid_glass

  assign autoplay = section.settings.autoplay
  assign autoplay_delay = section.settings.autoplay_delay
  assign overlay = section.settings.overlay
  assign overlay_color = section.settings.overlay_color

  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_max_width = section.settings.content_max_width
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  assign content_vertical_align = section.settings.content_vertical_align
  assign content_vertical_align_mobile = section.settings.content_vertical_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign first_button_color = section.settings.first_button_color
  assign first_button_hover_color = section.settings.first_button_hover_color
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign first_button_border_color = section.settings.first_button_border_color
  assign first_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.first_button_border_hover_color
  assign first_button_bg_color = section.settings.first_button_bg_color
  assign first_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.first_button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style
  assign second_button_color = section.settings.second_button_color
  assign second_button_hover_color = section.settings.second_button_hover_color
  assign second_button_border_color = section.settings.second_button_border_color
  assign second_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.second_button_border_hover_color
  assign second_button_bg_color = section.settings.second_button_bg_color
  assign second_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.second_button_bg_hover_color
  assign open_in_new_tab = section.settings.open_in_new_tab

  assign numbers_align = section.settings.numbers_align
  assign numbers_align_mobile = section.settings.numbers_align_mobile
  assign numbers_vertical_align = section.settings.numbers_vertical_align
  assign numbers_vertical_align_mobile = section.settings.numbers_vertical_align_mobile

  assign numbers_horizontal_align = ""
  if numbers_align == "center"
    assign numbers_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif numbers_align == "right"
    assign numbers_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign numbers_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign numbers_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if numbers_align_mobile == "center"
    assign numbers_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif numbers_align_mobile == "right"
    assign numbers_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign numbers_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign number_color = section.settings.number_color
  assign number_bg_color = section.settings.number_bg_color
  assign number_border_color = section.settings.number_border_color
  assign number_custom = section.settings.number_custom
  assign number_font = section.settings.number_font
  assign number_size = section.settings.number_size
  assign number_size_mobile = section.settings.number_size_mobile
  assign number_height = section.settings.number_height
  assign use_numbers = section.settings.use_numbers

  assign action_size = section.settings.action_size
  assign action_size_mobile = section.settings.action_size_mobile
  assign action_icon_size = section.settings.action_icon_size
  assign action_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.action_icon_size_mobile
  assign action_color = section.settings.action_color
  assign action_hover_color = section.settings.action_hover_color
  assign action_bg_color = section.settings.action_bg_color
  assign action_bg_hover_color = section.settings.action_bg_hover_color
  assign action_border_thickness = section.settings.action_border_thickness
  assign action_border_color = section.settings.action_border_color
  assign action_border_hover_color = section.settings.action_border_hover_color
  assign use_action = section.settings.use_action

  assign colors_advanced = section.settings.colors_advanced
  assign primary_color = section.settings.primary_color
  assign secondary_color = section.settings.secondary_color
  assign accent_color = section.settings.accent_color
-%}

{%- style -%}
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .video-banner-body-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    height: 100%;    
  }

  .video-banner-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100% !important;
    height: 100% !important;
  }

  .video-banner-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    position: relative;
    height: auto !important;
  }

  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} img,
  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} iframe,
  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} video {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
  }

  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }}:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    background-color: {{ overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: overlay }};
    z-index: 0;
  }

  .video-banner-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {  
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;    
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column; 
    z-index: 1;
    justify-content: {{ content_vertical_align_mobile }};
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-banner-slide-content-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;    
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    z-index: 1;
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    justify-content: {{ content_vertical_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-banner-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-banner-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;  
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    {% if colors_advanced %}
      color: {{ heading_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }    

  .video-banner-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;    
  }

  .video-banner-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    text-transform: unset;  
    word-break: break-word;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    {% if colors_advanced %}
      color: {{ text_color }};
    {% else %}
      color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
  }

  .video-banner-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    max-width: fit-content;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
    min-width: max-content;
  }

  .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }} {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    color: {{ first_button_color }};
    {% else %}
    color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
  }

  .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }} {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    color: {{ second_button_color }};
    {% elsif button_style == "non_outline" or button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
    color: {{ accent_color }};
    {% else %}
    color: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
  }

  .video-banner-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    color: {{ first_button_hover_color }};
    {% else %}
    color: {{ accent_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    background-color: transparent;
  }

  .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    fill: {{ first_button_color }};
    {% else %}
    fill: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    fill: {{ first_button_hover_color }};
    {% else %}
    fill: {{ accent_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }  

  .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    color: {{ second_button_hover_color }};
    {% else %}
    color: {{ accent_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    fill: {{ second_button_color }};
    {% elsif button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
    fill: {{ accent_color }};
    {% else %}
    fill: {{ primary_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    {% if colors_advanced %}
    fill: {{ second_button_hover_color }};
    {% else %}
    fill: {{ accent_color }};
    {% endif %}
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }  

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50% !important;
    transform: translateY(-50%) !important;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: {{ numbers_vertical_align_mobile }};
    gap: 8px;
    height: 98% !important;
    align-items: {{ numbers_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    z-index: 2 !important;
  }
  
  @keyframes headingAnimate{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
    0% {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(60%);
    }

    100% {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0)
    }
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: transparent;
    border-radius: 50%;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: 0.3s;
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet svg {
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    background-color: transparent;
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    height: 43px;
    width: 43px;
    margin: 0px;
    background-color: {{ number_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.5 }};
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet span {
    margin: 0;  
    font-size: {{ number_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ number_color }};
    line-height: {{ number_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .progress {
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
  }

  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .circle-origin {
    fill: transparent;
    background-color: {{ number_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.5 }};
    stroke: {{ number_border_color }};
    stroke-width: 1;
    stroke-linecap: round;
    stroke-dasharray: 125.664px;
    stroke-dashoffset: 125.664px;
  }
  
  .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet-active .circle-origin {
    -webkit-animation: progress{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ autoplay_delay | plus: 1 }}s;
    animation: progress{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ autoplay_delay | plus: 1 }}s;
  }
  
  @keyframes progress{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
    0% {
      stroke-dashoffset: 125.664px;
    }

    100% {
      stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
    }
  }

  .video-banner-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 15px;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 5%;
    left: {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    z-index: 3;
    width: {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ action_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ action_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    z-index: 2;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15);
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background: transparent;
    height: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ action_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ action_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ action_border_thickness }}px solid {{ action_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ action_bg_hover_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ action_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} .video-banner-play-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-banner-play-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.active .video-banner-pause-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .video-banner-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};      
      justify-content: {{ content_vertical_align }};
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-slide-content-wrap-{{ section.id }} {    
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
      width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
      justify-content: {{ content_vertical_align }};
    }
          
    .video-banner-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
    }

    .video-banner-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }
      
    .video-banner-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;    
    }

    .video-banner-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }  

    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ numbers_vertical_align }};
      align-items: {{ numbers_horizontal_align }};
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet span {
      font-size: {{ number_size }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} {
      left: {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
      width: {{ action_size }}px;
      height: {{ action_size }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ action_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block !important;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif width == 'page' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: var(--page-width);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

    .video-banner-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

    .video-banner-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

    .video-banner-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if number_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ number_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
    
    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet span {
      font-family: {{ number_font.family }}, {{ number_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ number_font.weight }};

{% endif %}

{% if liquid_glass %}
  <style>
    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} {
        position: relative; 
        overflow: hidden;
        z-index: 10;      
        background-color: transparent !important; 
        border-color: transparent !important;
        border-width: 0 !important;
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-filter-{{ section.id }},
    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-overlay-{{ section.id }},
    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit; 
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-filter-{{ section.id }} {
        backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
        filter: url(#lensFilter-{{ section.id }}) saturate(120%) brightness(1.15);
        z-index: 0; 
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-overlay-{{ section.id }} {
        background: var(--lg-bg-color); /* Например, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) */
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
        box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 var(--lg-highlight),
                    inset 0 0 5px var(--lg-highlight);
        z-index: 2;
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .liquid-button-content {
      position: relative;
      z-index: 3; 
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-overlay-{{ section.id }} {
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
      transition: background 0.25s ease;
    }

    .liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover .glass-overlay-{{ section.id }},
    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}.swiper-pagination-bullet-active .glass-overlay-{{ section.id }} {
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35); 
    }

    .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_color = first_button_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.75 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_color }};
      transition: transform 0.25s ease, background 0.25s ease, box-shadow 0.25s ease;
    }
    .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_hover_color = first_button_hover_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.85 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_hover_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_hover_color }};
    }

    .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_color = second_button_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.75 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_color }};
      transition: transform 0.25s ease, background 0.25s ease, box-shadow 0.25s ease;
    }
    .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_hover_color = second_button_hover_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.85 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_hover_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_hover_color }};
    }

    .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_color = action_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.75 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_color }};
      transition: transform 0.3s ease, background 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, border 0.3s ease;
    }
    .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_hover_color = action_hover_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.85 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_hover_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_hover_color }};
    }

    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_color = number_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.75 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_color }};
      transition: transform 0.3s ease, background 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, border 0.3s ease;
    }
    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}.swiper-pagination-bullet-active .glass-specular-{{ section.id }},
    .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover .glass-specular-{{ section.id }} {
      {% assign highlight_hover_color = number_border_color | color_lighten: 40 | color_modify: 'alpha', 0.85 %}
      box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 0 {{ highlight_hover_color }},
                  inset 0 0 5px {{ highlight_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>

  {% if section.settings.liquid_glass_hover_effect %}
    <style>
      .video-banner-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }},
      .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }},
      .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} {
        transition: transform 0.35s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 2.2), background 0.25s ease, box-shadow 0.25s ease; /* Overshoot on transform only */
      }
      .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }} {
          transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 2.2), background 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, border 0.3s ease;
      }

      .video-banner-first-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
        transform: scale(1.08); 
      }

       .video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.liquid-design-{{ section.id }}{
          transform-origin: center center;
       }
    </style>
  {% endif %}
{% endif %}

{% if button_style == "non_outline" or button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} video-banner-{{ section.id }}" {% if background_style == 'solid' %}style="background-color:{{ background_color }};"{% else %} style="background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"{% endif %}>
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="video-banner-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="video-banner-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              {% if block.type == 'slide' %}
                <div class="video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.video_url_mobile != blank or block.settings.video_mobile != blank %}
                    {% assign video_url_id = block.settings.video_url.id %}
                    {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id %}
                    {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                    {% assign loop_url = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_url_id %}
                    {%- if block.settings.source != 'uploaded' -%}
                      {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url }}"                      
                          data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}" 
                          data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"     
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }}"
                        ></iframe>
                        {%- elsif block.settings.video_url.type == 'vimeo' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }}"
                        ></iframe>
                        {% else %}
                          {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                          <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ placeholder_video }}" muted autoplay playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }}"></video>
                      {% endif %}                       
                    {% else %}
                      {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                      <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" muted autoplay playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy video-banner-video-desktop-{{ section.id }}"></video>
                    {% endif %}  

                    {% assign video_url_id_mobile = block.settings.video_url_mobile.id %}
                    {% assign video_id_mobile = block.settings.video_mobile.id %}
                    {% assign loop_mobile = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id_mobile %}
                    {% assign loop_url_mobile = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_url_id_mobile %}
                    {%- if block.settings.source != 'uploaded' -%}
                      {%- if block.settings.video_url_mobile.type == 'youtube' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}"                      
                          data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}" 
                          data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}"     
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }}"
                        ></iframe>
                        {%- elsif block.settings.video_url_mobile.type == 'vimeo' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}"
                          data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}"
                          data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id_mobile }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url_mobile }}"
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }}"
                        ></iframe>
                        {% else %}
                          {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                          <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ placeholder_video }}" muted autoplay playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }}"></video>
                      {% endif %}                       
                    {% else %}
                      {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                      <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video_mobile != blank %}{{ block.settings.video_mobile.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" muted autoplay playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy video-banner-video-mobile-{{ section.id }}"></video>
                    {% endif %}  

                  {% else %}
                    {% assign video_url_id = block.settings.video_url.id %}
                    {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id %}
                    {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                    {% assign loop_url = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_url_id %}
                    {%- if block.settings.source != 'uploaded' -%}
                      {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url }}"                      
                          data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}" 
                          data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"     
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy"
                        ></iframe>
                        {%- elsif block.settings.video_url.type == 'vimeo' -%}
                        <iframe
                          {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_url_id }}?enablejsapi=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0{{ loop_url }}"
                          allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                          allowfullscreen
                          class="lazy"
                        ></iframe>
                        {% else %}

                          <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ placeholder_video }}" muted autoplay playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>

                    {% else %}
                      {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}

                  {% endif %}

                          height="1em"
                          role="presentation"
                          class="video-banner-play-{{ section.id }}"
                        >

                                          <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                                        </svg>
                                      {% endif %}
                                  </p>
                              </div>
                          </{% if block.settings.first_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                        {% endif %}

                        {% if block.settings.second_button != blank %}
                          <{% if block.settings.second_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.second_url }}" {% if open_in_new_tab %} target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} 
                              class="video-banner-button-{{ section.id }} video-banner-second-button-{{ section.id }} liquid-design-{{ section.id }}"
                          >
                            {% if liquid_glass %}
                              <div class="glass-filter-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                              <div class="glass-overlay-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                              <div class="glass-specular-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                            {% endif %}

                              <div class="liquid-button-content">
                                  <p class="video-banner-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                                      {{ block.settings.second_button }}
                                      {% if button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                                        <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                          <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                                          <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>

                </div>
              {% endif %}
            {% endfor %}
          </div>        
        </div>  
        {% if use_numbers %}
          <div class="video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
        {% endif %}
      </div> 
      {% if liquid_glass %}
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="display: none;">
          <filter id="lensFilter-{{ section.id }}" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%" filterUnits="objectBoundingBox">
            <feComponentTransfer in="SourceAlpha" result="alpha">
              <feFuncA type="identity" />
            </feComponentTransfer>
            <feGaussianBlur in="alpha" stdDeviation="50" result="blur" />
            <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" scale="50" xChannelSelector="A" yChannelSelector="A" />
          </filter>
        </svg>  
      {% endif %}
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>

<script>
function initVideoBanner() { 

  window.addEventListener(
    "LazyLoad::Initialized",
    function (event) {
      window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
    },
    false
  );

  let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

  const slider = new Swiper(".video-banner-slider-{{ section.id }}", {  
    effect: "fade",   
    speed: 500,
    loop: true,
    {% if autoplay %}
      autoplay: {
        delay: {{ autoplay_delay }} * 1000,
        disableOnInteraction: false,
      },
    {% endif %}
    {% if use_numbers %}
      pagination: {
        el: '.video-banner-numbers-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        clickable: true,
        renderBullet: function (i, className) {
          {% if liquid_glass %}
            {% if autoplay %}
              return `<button class="${className} ${className}-{{ section.id }} liquid-design-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="glass-filter-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="glass-overlay-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="glass-specular-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="liquid-button-content">
                          <svg class="progress" width="43" height="43"><circle class="circle-origin" r="20" cx="21.5" cy="21.5"></circle></svg>
                          <span>${i + 1}</span>
                        </div>
                      </button>`;
            {% else %}
              return `<button class="${className} ${className}-{{ section.id }} liquid-design-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="glass-filter-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="glass-overlay-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="glass-specular-{{ section.id }}" style="display: block !important"></div>
                        <div class="liquid-button-content">
                          <span>${i + 1}</span>
                        </div>
                      </button>`;
            {% endif %}
          {% else %}
            {% if autoplay %}
              return `<button class="${className} ${className}-{{ section.id }}"><svg class="progress" width="43" height="43"><circle class="circle-origin" r="20" cx="21.5" cy="21.5"></circle></svg><span>${i + 1}</span></button>`;
            {% else %}
              return `<button class="${className} ${className}-{{ section.id }}"><span>${i + 1}</span></button>`;
            {% endif %}
          {% endif %}
        }
      }
    {% endif %}
  });

  document.querySelectorAll(`.video-banner-slide-{{ section.id }}`).forEach(el => {
    let btn = el.querySelector(`.video-banner-action-{{ section.id }}`);
    let frame = el.querySelector('iframe');
    let video = el.querySelector('video');
    
    if(btn) {
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        btn.classList.toggle('active');
        if(btn.classList.contains('active')) {
          if(frame) {
            let src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
            frame.src = src1;
          }
          if(video) {
            video.pause();
          }
        } else {
          if(frame) {
            let src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
            frame.src = src2;
          }
          if(video) {
            video.play();
          }
        }
      });
    }
  });
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initVideoBanner);

if (Shopify.designMode) {
  document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initVideoBanner);
  document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initVideoBanner);
}

</script>
